amendment.description: To establish a special committee of the Senate on war and reconstruction contracting.

action.text: Amendment SA 2078 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2078.
Motion to suspend Rule XVI on amendment SA 2078 made in Senate.
Motion to suspend Rule XVI with respect to amendment SA 2078 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 54. Record Vote Number: 259.
Amendment SA 2078 ruled out of order by the chair.
